list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: strike a surface noisily to attract attention, especially when waiting to be let in through a door.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I knocked on the kitchen door

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: collide with (someone or something), giving them a hard blow.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he deliberately ran into her, knocking her shoulder
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh cố tình chạy vào cô, gõ vai cô.

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a sudden short sound caused by a blow, especially on a door to attract attention or gain entry.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the casing is tough enough to withstand knocks
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Vỏ đủ cứng để chịu được tiếng gõ cửa
